articles.author: L'EQUIPE
articles.title: La FFF et la FFR unies face au Stade de France
articles.description: La Fédération française de football et son homologue du rugby sont unies dans un objectif commun : baisser le prix de la location du Stade de France.
articles.content: Actuellement, la 3F paye environ 2 millions d'euros par match, elle doit quatre rencontres par an, soit environ 8 M, au consortium du SDF (Vinci et Bouygues, les gestionnaires, et l'État, le propriét… [+514 chars]

articles.author: Dave WilsonESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Former Oklahoma Sooners coach Bob Stoops says program in good shape, Lincoln Riley 'didn't invent OU football'
articles.description: On the day he was honored by the Oklahoma Legislature for his achievements, former Sooners coach Bob Stoops took the time to remind fans that the program is in good hands despite the exit of coach Lincoln Riley.
articles.content:
On a day he was celebrated by the Oklahoma Legislature, former Sooners coach Bob Stoops gave a campaign-like speech reassuring fans after the departure of coach Lincoln Riley.
"Lincoln Riley didn't … [+3657 chars]

articles.author: PA Staff
articles.title: Oldham to ban fans who invaded pitch during defeat that confirmed relegation
articles.description: Oldham have announced their intention to issue club bans to supporters who invaded the pitch for almost an hour on Saturday as they suffered relegation from the Football League in defeat to Salford.
articles.content: Oldham have announced their intention to issue club bans to supporters who invaded the pitch for almost an hour on Saturday as they suffered relegation from the Football League in defeat to Salford.… [+1639 chars]

articles.description: Why do a footballer, a Nobel laureate and a prime minister (no, not Imran Khan) find themselves in the ESPNcricinfo player database? | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content:
